title: ｛求助｝服务端莫名崩溃
author: ty00ty
txt_content:
手上一共只有80金粒了，求大家帮助，要疯了...

崩溃日志

replies.author: Pusa-小七
replies.txt_content:
Block type: ID #566 (tile.tidal_bell // com.pixelmonmod.pixelmon.blocks.BlockBell // pixelmon:tidal_bell)
Block data value: 0 / 0x0 / 0b0000
Block location: World: (-482,64,-670), Chunk: (at 14,4,2 in -31,-42; contains blocks -496,0,-672 to -481,255,-657), Region: (-1,-2; contains chunks -32,-64 to -1,-33, blocks -512,0,-1024 to -1,255,-513)
用MCEdit进入地图，然后到-482，64，-670这个位置，找到上面的错误方块，删除他, 当然你也可以直接删除整个区块

replies.author: ty00ty
replies.txt_content:
要是有什么需要补充的尽管联系我，在线等，
不知道下一次又多会儿崩溃，急死人呜呜呜嘤嘤嘤

replies.author: pp1416516975
replies.txt_content:
一般在崩溃报告中可以找到出错的方块，类似这样：
Location: World: (189,77,-736), Chunk: (at 13,4,0 in 11,-46; contains blocks 176,0,-736 to 191,255,-721), Region: (0,-2; contains chunks 0,-64 to 31,-33, blocks 0,0,-1024 to 511,255,-513)
可以参照skyliye大大的这篇教程回档服务器/删除区块解决此问题：https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-872765-1-1.html

replies.author: ty00ty
replies.txt_content:
Pusa-小七 发表于 2020-4-27 21:31
Block type: ID #566 (tile.tidal_bell // com.pixelmonmod.pixelmon.blocks.BlockBell // pixelmon:tidal_ ...
谢谢，解决了。
把-482，64，-670这个位置删还是有错误区块还是会崩
然后我把-496,0,-672 to -481,255,-657一整个大区块给删了，然后就好了，嘿嘿
